acomplishments: Greenfield development of Ruby on Rails application for civic activism through social networking.
Optimized Ruby code and database query generation to improve ScrumNinja performance, bringing 8s actions to ~300ms.

Divided monolithic application into several cooperating web services, which allowed us to outsource the majority of our systems administartion to Heroku, yielding a more stable production environment.

jobs.position: Web Application and Systems Administration Intern
acomplishments: Learned the ropes of using behavior driven development, pair programming, and other XP techniques on client work while getting acquainted with the codebase of Internaut's product, ScrumNinja.
Optimized Internaut's server platform, utilizing technologies such as HAProxy and Nginx and writing custom Unix system scripts
